mapper.select: SELECT max(CASE pc.param_code WHEN "FP001" THEN pc.method_code ELSE '' END) costSettlement , max(CASE pc.param_code WHEN "FP002" THEN pc.method_code ELSE '' END) costSettlementSort, max(CASE pc.param_code WHEN "FP003" THEN pc.method_code ELSE null END) realInterestRate, max(CASE pc.param_code WHEN "FP001" THEN cpc.method_name ELSE '' END) costSettlementName , max(CASE pc.param_code WHEN "FP002" THEN cpc.method_name ELSE '' END) costSettlementSortName, max(CASE pc.param_code WHEN "FP003" THEN cpc.method_name ELSE null END) realInterestRateName FROM val_param_configure pc LEFT JOIN val_cal_param_configure cpc ON pc.method_code = cpc.method_code WHERE pc.fund_configure_id=#{fundConfigureId} LIMIT 1
